thread.title: Is this The Walking Dead’s most gruesome scene EVER? Twitter goes into overdrive for latest zombie killing-spree
thread.title_full: Is this The Walking Dead’s most gruesome scene EVER? Twitter goes into overdrive for latest zombie killing-spree

title: Is this The Walking Dead’s most gruesome scene EVER? Twitter goes into overdrive for latest zombie killing-spree
text:
TV Magazine WIPEOUT! Is this The Walking Dead’s most gruesome scene EVER? Twitter goes into overdrive for latest zombie killing-spree 
The survivors got inventive and took out a hoard of walkers with an ingenious cheese-wire car wipe-out Spoiler Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments WHILE the humans continued to work out how to defeat the other humans on the latest Walking Dead episode – it was business as usual for the zombies. 
Producers of the show are always thinking up new ways on how to maim the undead, and Sunday night’s show saw a particularly gruesome scene play out that had Twitter fans reacting in a frenzy – with some labelling it as the most violent yet. AMC 3 Michonne and Rick joined forces to wipe out a hoard of walkers with their cars and some wires 
When faced with the struggle of getting rid of yet another herd of walkers, Rick (Andrew Lincoln) and Michonne (Danai Gurira) made the ingenious decision to tie two cables between their cars, put their foot down firmly on the gas, and meet the zombies in the middle. If you dug this incredible #TWD scene, I implore you to check out the storyboards on how they mapped it out. https://t.co/TgRa5Kw9VB pic.twitter.com/B5TlBskvLn 
— Dalton Ross (@DaltonRoss) February 13, 2017 THAT IS THE BEST THING I'VE SEEN ALL DAY @WalkingDead_AMC #TWD #TheWalkingDead pic.twitter.com/KnIJ9IeQKU It's the beginning of the resistance on The Walking Dead That car scene was so bad ass holy shit #TWD #TheWalkingDead 
— Michelle Ryan (@ShellRy) February 13, 2017 AMC The resistance is growing as the survivors grow tired of Negan LATEST FROM TV & SHOWBIZ What did George Michael 999 call reveal about superstar's death? IT'S BACK! The Walking Dead returns with explosive episode which sees Rick take on the Saviors 'IT'S THE NATURAL WAY' Tamara Ecclestone defends breastfeeding photoshoot insisting it's something she 'believes in' MEAN GIRLS STYLE Adele BREAKS her Grammy Award in half and dedicates it to Beyonce leaving singer in tears Mr and Mrs? Adele appears to confirm marriage to Simon Konecki by calling him her 'husband' in Grammys acceptance speech A GRAMMYS OF TWO HALVES Adele overcomes Grammys performance nightmare to be crowned the night's big winner with FIVE awards 'I NEED TO SHAVE MY HEAD' Katy Perry angers Britney fans by making dig about singer's breakdown TWICE at the Grammys 'HELLO' GONGS! Adele cleans up at the Grammys and scoops up FIVE awards including Record and Album of the Year 'Of course I love Drake' Jennifer Lopez gushes over 'talented and amazing' Drake after Grammy's quiz on fling perils of live TV Lady Gaga and Metallica's fiery duet falters at Grammys as unlikely pair hit by technical mishap 'I CAN'T MESS THIS UP' Astonishing moment emotional Adele sobs and turns the air blue as she stops George Michael tribute on live TV and demands to start again during Grammys show blah blah land Luvvies ditch the thank-yous and use Bafta podium as a soap-box to take swipes Trump Okay. That car scene with Rick & Michonne was just badass! #twd
